title: Client Crash after Champion Select
body:
My game just crashed after champion select. I couldn't reload it so I close client it starts repairing some stuff. I load in and it gets remade >.<

Please don't tell me this is an issue with my network/harddrive/PC etc..

This is happening on your side. I am not asking for a refund of the LP, but for you to admit this is a fault on your end and actually start investigating.

Speaking of which, before the loading screen was delayed by 30 seconds or so when there was someone that didn't connect. Why was this removed?

replies.body: I'd like to help you out with this but need some more information.  After champion select, are you receiving any errors?  Does the loading screen even load at all?  If a loading screen is delaying, it's usually a result of a connection issue having trouble connecting to the game server and not due to another player.  Let me know, and I'd be happy to offer some assistance!

Hi there,

This is what happens exactly.

Champion Select no matter what mode goes fine and normal. Then sometimes a crash happens to the actual game and I am left with the "Game has crashed, click here to reconnect" I click it but just keeps on bringing me to a black screen and crashes again. I close client completely, open the launcher and I get a corrupt files messages tell me to repair, starts repairing and I can load into the game with crashing for 5 or so games.

I have not found a fix to this problem, many people have this issue, but there is a way to make sure you can still get into the game. Simply click exit and close down your client as well. Wait around 5 seconds and then restart your client so that you can reconnect. Hope this helps. 
If this fails, be sure to run as administrator  or  send a ticket to riot.

Thanks for the detailed follow up!  After champion select, your network establishes a connection to your group's game server.  If no connection is made, you will end up with the black screen that you're seeing.  There may be a connection issue here which could be caused by several things like the strength of your network or even a firewall.  

As a first step, please go over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  I also recommend using our[ hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which can automatically make adjustments like configuring your firewall to all League access.

These resources should get you fixed up, but let me know if you continue to have any problems!
They wont, this has been happening forever and is an ongoing problem. I have been having this issue for awhile. It's happened to me three times in the last two days. rofl
